The competition started on April 4, 1909 and concluded on April 8, 1909 with the Final, held at the [[Estadio O'Donnell|O'Donnell]], in [[Madrid]], in which [[Club Ciclista de San SebastiÃ¡n]] lifted the trophy for the first time ever with a 3â1 victory over [[Club EspaÃ±ol de Madrid|EspaÃ±ol Madrid]]. ==First round== {{footballbox| date= 4 April 1909| team1= [[Athletic de Bilbao]] | score= 2–4 | report= | team2= [[Club Ciclista de San SebastiÃ¡n|Club Ciclista]] | stadium=[[Estadio O'Donnell|O'Donnell]], [[Madrid]] | referee= }} ==Semifinals== {{footballbox | date = April 5, 1909 | team1 = [[Club EspaÃ±ol de Madrid|EspaÃ±ol de Madrid]] | score = 3–2 | team2 = [[FC Barcelona]] | stadium = [[Estadio O'Donnell|O'Donnell]], [[Madrid]] }} {{footballbox | date = April 6, 1909 | team1 = [[Club Ciclista de San SebastiÃ¡n|Club Ciclista]] | score = 2–0 | team2 = [[Galicia FC]] | stadium = [[Estadio O'Donnell|O'Donnell]], [[Madrid]] }} ==Final== {{main|1909 Copa del Rey Final}} {{footballbox| date= 8 April 1909| team1= [[Club Ciclista de San SebastiÃ¡n|Club Ciclista]] | score= 3–1 | report= | team2= [[Club EspaÃ±ol de Madrid|EspaÃ±ol FC de Madrid]] | goals1= MacGuinness {{goal|30|pen.}}
